definitions.definition: Any of various fungi , principally of the order Agaricales , having fruiting bodies consisting of umbrella -like caps , on stalks, with numerous gills beneath.
A dried fruiting body of a fungus formerly used in medicine (now Laricifomes officinalis , formerly Fomitopsis officinalis , Fomes officinalis , Polyporus officinalis ).

main_definition: Any of various fungi , principally of the order Agaricales , having fruiting bodies consisting of umbrella -like caps , on stalks, with numerous gills beneath.
secondary_definitions: A dried fruiting body of a fungus formerly used in medicine (now Laricifomes officinalis , formerly Fomitopsis officinalis , Fomes officinalis , Polyporus officinalis ).
